Description: Loosely woven undyed linen with an almond-shaped tapestry ornament of a flower and leaves in red, pink, green and yellow wool and brown linen; linen self-bands and isolated petal-like motifs in red wool; from a curtain or other furnishing, the decor mainly consisting of scattered ornaments; plain weave: warp-undyed linen (S/11), weft-undyed linen (S/7); tapestry on grouped threads: warp-undyed linen (S/7), weft-undyed and brown linen (S), pink, red, yellow and green wool (all S/30)
Curator's comments: Unreg. 52; found in 1988? a packet in Keeper's Office; dyed brown linen is unusual, appears to have been dyed as yarn but dye probably not iron; similar to 72423
